revised_title: Joseph Burtt Hutchinson: A Life of Dedication to Science, Agriculture, and Development
tldr: Joseph Burtt Hutchinson was a renowned agricultural scientist who dedicated his life to advancing knowledge in genetics and taxonomy of cottons, while also promoting science and education in developing countries. His work in Trinidad and India significantly contributed to the understanding of cotton genetics and plant breeding, and he inspired many through his dedication to Christian principles, agricultural common sense, and scientific excellence.
